val:
Welcome to my new blog, I hope you enjoy your stay! Fasten your seatbelts, decrease ambient lights, then follow me inside programming universe.

Who am I ?

French generalist engineer at first, I dedicated myself to software programming since 2012. I started professional coding in a reasearch laboratory environement, where aeronautics or military customers where focus on system ergonomics analysis, and developing innovative features through off-the-shelves methods or absolutely new devices. Among others, I also worked in more creative environment like dance performances and kids workshop.

Curiosity drives my cravings, unknown territories are my fields of actions, and I really like that!

Comments sections will be added soon. Meanwhile, you can contact me at this adress : jconan@outlook.fr

Have fun :)
